column2: an A.M. Eatery////This breakfast is so delicious
column4: considering that I kept eating far beyond the point of satiation
column5: I guess I did sin. But
column6: gluttony is by FAR worth having to ask forgiveness for. Lol I've never not had anything I didn't like. If you're an indecisive foodie like me
column7: try the pancake flight--and don't be deceived by the name of it--you can include French toast as one of the three you try. It's worth the wait and the calories! But
column8: make sure you have absolutely nothing to do after. Cause you'll definitely need a nap! Lol I now know why it's called snooze .
